From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron:



Unitron flipped through the air, landing on his feet a little ways to the 
left, avoiding the charges and one optic blast with amazing agility for a 
robot his side.  He looked down at where he had been shot, in the right side.

"Pathetic!" he yelled, raising his laser rifle and firing off three shots at 
Hot Rod's sternum, firing two optic blasts at his chest.
